backend/main.mo: Defines game rule types and initializes rule data for multiple games inside the main actor, including Skyjo, Mille Bornes, Nerts, Phase 10, and Flip7.
backend/migration.mo: Defines OldActor and NewActor types and structures needed for state migration, including full game session and profile schemas.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human‑written summaries for key frontend files describing functionality and recent updates.
frontend/deployment-logs/.gitignore: Ignores all deployment log files while keeping the directory.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Documentation explaining prerequisites and steps for local deployment and debugging.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme definitions with light and dark mode variables applied globally.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/rebuild-and-capture-log: Node script that automates rebuild and deployment while capturing logs to timestamped files.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app's root layout, authentication checks, and TanStack Router routes for main screens.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a dialog for entering and saving a new user's profile name via actor mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main layout with navigation, header behavior, mobile menu, and login button.
frontend/src/components/rules/GameRulesD: Shows a dialog presenting a game's rules, description, and win conditions based on a template.
frontend/src/components/scores/EditRound: Provides a dialog for editing a round's scores, choosing the appropriate score entry component per game type.
frontend/src/components/scores/Flip7Scor: Handles Flip7 scoring input including card selection, modifiers, multipliers, manual entry, and score calculation.
frontend/src/components/scores/GenericGa: Renders simple numeric score inputs for each player and submits validated scores for a generic game.
frontend/src/components/scores/MilleBorn: Form component for entering Mille Bornes round data, managing distance, bonuses, and flags per player, then calculating and submitting scores.
frontend/src/components/scores/NertsScor: Handles input of center and tableau card counts for each player, computes Nerts scores, validates input, and submits the round state.
frontend/src/components/scores/Phase10Sc: Manages Phase 10 per‑player score entry and phase completion flags, validating input and submitting the round’s score and completion state.
frontend/src/components/scores/RoundsTab: Displays a table of all rounds with per‑player scores and provides an edit button for each round.
frontend/src/components/scores/SkyjoScor: Simple score entry form for Skyjo that validates numeric scores and submits them along with the saved round state.
frontend/src/components/scores/SpiritsOw: Tracks stone selections for each Spirits of the Wild player, calculates scores using owl scoring logic, and submits the full round state.
frontend/src/gameTemplates.ts: Defines game templates with metadata and provides a function stub for creating backend game types.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoHideHeaderOnSc: Tracks scroll direction to show or hide the header after passing a scroll threshold.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's profile using the authenticated actor and provides authentication state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameSessions.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching, creating, and updating game sessions and rounds.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a provider and hooks for Internet Identity login, storage, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerProfiles.ts: Manages loading, creating, and fetching individual player profiles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpiritsOfTheWildAn: Fetches Spirits of the Wild animal data from the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes with Apple‑like color palettes.
Handles saving, loading, and clearing round entry state in sessionStorage with serialization helpers and legacy fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/scoring.ts: Implements score aggregation, standings sorting by game type, and game-end detection based on target scores or phase progress.
frontend/src/lib/sessionTypes.ts: Defines shared TypeScript types for players, rounds, per‑game entry states, and local session structures.
frontend/src/lib/spiritsOwlScoring.ts: Computes Spirits Owl board score by counting completed pairs and applying a spirit-stone multiplier.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/screens/GamePickerScreen.ts: Displays a list of selectable game templates and navigates to the setup screen when a game is chosen.
frontend/src/screens/HistoryScreen.tsx: Shows authenticated users a sortable list of saved game sessions with navigation to individual game views.
frontend/src/screens/ProfilesScreen.tsx: Manages player profiles, allowing creation and listing of saved players for authenticated users.
frontend/src/screens/ScoreSheetScreen.ts: Loads or initializes a session, handles round submission and editing, and displays score entry components per game type.
React screen for configuring a new game session, handling player selection, quick players, game-specific settings, and selecting active Spirits of the Wild animals.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash fragments, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing Spirits of the Wild features, backend requirements, and pending feature requests for animal catalog and setup UI.
